
lbs.aps.sms Read me File

This service is the security management service  

Usage:


var express = require('express');
var oBS = express();
var oHelpers= require('./utilities/helpers.js');

var smsAPI  = require('../smsAPI');
oAuthenticator =  smsAPI.createAuthenticator();

//var oRouter = router.init();

//oBS.get('/', deliverHomePage);
//oBS.get('/login',oAuthenticator.loginUser);

//oBS.get('/static/*', oAccessController.isAuthorized, staticPageRouter);

oBS.get('/loginUser', oAuthenticator.loginUser);

oBS.get('/registerUser', oAuthenticator.registerUser);

oBS.get('/personal/home',isloginin, accesscontrol,  personalHomePageRouter);

//oBS.get('/personal/*', oAccessController.isAuthorized, personalPageRouter);
//oBS.get('/serviceCorporate/*', oAccessController.isAuthorized, corporatePageRouter);
//oBS.get('/servicePoint/*', oAccessController.isAuthorized, servicePointPageRouter);

oBS.get('*', four_oh_four);

oBS.listen(9090);

console.log(" Business Sevice Started on Port: 9090 " );

function deliverHomePage(req, res, next) {
    res.writeHead(200, { "Content-Type" : "application/json" });
    res.end("Welcome to home page\n \n");
   
    
}

function personalDataRouter(req, res) {
    res.writeHead(200, { "Content-Type" : "application/json" });
    res.end("Personal data delivered \n \n");
      
}

function personalHomePageRouter(req, res) {
    res.writeHead(200, { "Content-Type" : "application/json" });
    res.end("Personal home page delivered \n \n");
    
}

function four_oh_four(req, res) {
    res.writeHead(404, { "Content-Type" : "application/json" });
    res.end(JSON.stringify(oHelpers.invalid_resource()) + "\n \n");
    
}
